name: When I Was
description:
This prototype was developed for a school project with the help of 5 gentlemans.

Plot : 

Earth, year 2137. The SAN (Social Astral Network) is one of the largest data management and cybernetics companies throughout the solar system. Its growing influenceover the last century has left no room for competition, and the company's overwhelming weight company prevents any resistance.

Gabby, a young barista at the L3A-4D Counter and an anti-SAN activist, spends his days working in a world where living conditions are only getting worse. Although he longs for a better life, he is aware that he cannot do anything about a company that controls everything.

One night, after the bar had closed, he was hit by a SAN truck. The young waiter,who felt he was dying, will end up opening his eyes in a place he doesn't know, with a body that is not his. He notes with concern that his body is that of a cyborg.

But this implantation, he is not the first one to make the expenses of it. Very quickly, one will ask him to carry out a series of tests, of which that to pass through the veils of time.

However, Gabby understands that he should not have kept memories of his past life.Very quickly charged with missions of assassination or sabotage, he realizes that  the technology of time-travel developed by the SAN and kept secret,  was used by the company to eliminate all competition before it was even born...

Eliminating governments, opponents and influencing events of the past, the conglomerate leaves no room for an alternative history.

Realizing that his unique position offers him a way to change the lives of billions of people, Gabby decides to use his  newfound abilities to dismantle the SAN from the inside, even if it means sacrificing himself...
